title: NFL Championship Weekend Reaction
description:
Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti react to Tom Brady advancing to his 10th Super Bowl with the Buccaneers' win over Aaron Rodgers and the Packers (2:00). On the AFC side, they talk about the Chiefs' 38-24 victory over the Bills (31:30). Finally, Kevin and Nora preview Super Bowl LV (41:55) and answer some listener questions (52:35).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
